main event: A witness observed a large, irregularly shaped white object lying on the ground in an open field in Van Nuys, California.
interesting points: The white object was approximately 15 feet in diameter and 6 feet in height., The surface of the object was smooth and shiny., The witness reported that the object did not appear to be of human manufacture., The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes before it suddenly disappeared., The case is currently under investigation by the United States Air Force.
sighted object: a large white object lying on the ground
witness description: a witness who reported observing the object
